title: Killer USA
overview: Global production outfit FirstLook TV and True Crime Network have greenlit a new docuseries, Killer USA, based on the existing format Killer Britain, which airs on A+E's C+I service in the UK.The 10-episode series will follow the format of the UK version, examining true stories of murder and deception that captured the public's imagination. Killer USA will be hosted by acclaimed TV journalist Brian Ross.
